trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANPIX112_03700_SEQ_00<tab>Uin Nee wishes to experience the joys of boating in a Fuath-free environment.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANPIX112_03700_TODO_00<tab>Survey the designated location east of Mithai Glorianda and obtain a wing membrane from a deepglider.
TEXT_BANPIX112_03700_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the deepglider wing membrane to Uin Nee.

TEXT_BANPIX112_03700_UINNEE_000_001<tab>Tyr Beq was telling me all about your trip to Kholusia. Is it true that the ocean is even bigger than Longmirror Lake? I hear the mortals there love to go boating, where they can forget their troubles and maybe catch a fish or two.

TEXT_BANPIX112_03700_UINNEE_000_002<tab>I'd love to try it here, but those horrid Fuath are bound to show up and spoil our fun! ...Oh, of course! We can do it in Lyhe Mheg instead, and have the children join us too!

TEXT_BANPIX112_03700_UINNEE_000_003<tab>There's just one problem: I haven't the faintest idea what a boat looks like. Perhaps we can try making one from the wing of a deepglider...which I'm sure you'll be more than willing to collect for me!
TEXT_BANPIX112_03700_UINNEE_000_020<tab>I have a vague recollection of asking you to bring me something... What was it?
TEXT_BANPIX112_03700_UINNEE_000_021<tab>Ah, yes! I remember now! This should work nicely. Not that I have a clue what to do with it...

TEXT_BANPIX112_03700_UINNEE_000_022<tab>So it needs to float on the water and support the weight of several small children. It can't be that difficult to make a thing like that from a bit of lizard skin, can it?

TEXT_BANPIX112_03700_UINNEE_000_023<tab>And since we won't be boating on real water, as long as we can conjure up something that at least <var 1A 02 /var>looks<var 1A 01 /var> like a boat, it should be fine. Oh yes, we'll have the finest adventures with the children on the ocean blue! ...It <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> blue, isn't it?
